statements: DELETE FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' AND credits > 3;

DELETE FROM Course WHERE instructor='Dr. Smith' AND credits > 3;
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE enrollment_id=10 OR (student_id=101 AND course_id=201);
